abstract: Citigroup is expected to name Gary L. Crittenden as its new chief financial officer in a move that aims to appease frustrated investors.
snippet: Citigroup is expected to name Gary L. Crittenden as its new chief financial officer in a move that aims to appease frustrated investors.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup, one of the world’s largest banks, is expected to name Gary L. Crittenden as its new chief financial officer in a move that aims to appease frustrated investors and end weeks of top management turmoil.

headline.main: Citigroup Expected to Name a New Financial Chief
headline.print_headline: Citigroup Said to Be Close to Naming a New Financial Chief From American Express
